articles.title: I didn't dare let my classmates know mum is a celebrity, says Chen Xiuhuan's daughter Shanisse - AsiaOne

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore committed to reopening borders even as Omicron spreads - The Star Online
articles.description: Singapore is committed to steadily reopening its borders and aims to set up more quarantine-free travel agreements, Transport Minister S. Iswaran said in Parliament on Monday as the Asian country battles a rising number of coronavirus cases.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Jan 10 (Bloomberg): Singapore is committed to steadily reopening its borders and aims to set up more quarantine-free travel agreements, Transport Minister S. Iswaran said in Parliament on … [+1935 chars]

articles.title: Man attacks son with knife during argument in Serangoon flat - AsiaOne
